articles.title: Could’ve been India’s best-ever all-rounder in ODIs but I was sidelined: Irfan Pathan on what went wrong... - Hindustan Times
articles.description: “In terms of achievement, there could have been a lot more. I really believe that in One-Day Internationals I could have been the best all-rounder that India ever produced, I could have been. That didn’t happen because I didn’t play as much cricket as I could…
articles.content: Irfan Pathan feels he had the potential to become India’s best all-rounder of all time, had a few things panned out differently in his career. Pathan burst on to the scene as a 19-year-old quick who … [+3863 chars]
